   contain the root `toctree` directive.

A User's Guide to Stellar CCD Photometry with photutils
=======================================================

This document is a guide to performing stellar photometry from CCD data
using `photutils`__, an `astropy`__ affiliated package.

It follows the same steps outlined in Massey & Lindsey's `A User's Guide
to Stellar CCD Photometry with IRAF (1992)`__.




Contents:

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2



Indices and tables
==================

* :ref:`genindex`
* :ref:`modindex`
* :ref:`search`

.. __: https://photutils.readthedocs.io
.. __: http://astropy.org
.. __: ftp://iraf.noao.edu/ftp/docs/daophot2.ps.Z
